snippet: The police said a woman entered the Heckscher Playground and plucked a 2-year-old off a swing, but the nanny pulled him from her arms and the woman fled.
abstract: New York City Police Dept reports that unidentified woman attempted to abduct a toddler from Central Park playground, but was stopped by boy's nanny.
lead_paragraph: The police said a woman entered the Heckscher Playground and plucked a 2-year-old off a swing, but the nanny pulled him from her arms and the woman fled.

headline.main: Nanny Stops Abduction of Boy in Central Park
